choose.when: where n_title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or n_content like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')

mapper.select: select IFnull(count(*),0) from notice_board nn inner join member_Info mm on nn.mem_no=mm.mem_no

select nn.*,mm.mem_no,mm.Nickname from notice_board nn inner join member_Info mm on nn.mem_no=mm.mem_no
order by nn.n_board_no desc limit #{startRow},10
mapper.update: update notice_board set n_hit=n_hit+1 where n_board_no=#{n_board_no}
mapper.select: select * from notice_board where n_board_no = (select n_board_no from notice_board where n_board_no < #{n_board_no} order by n_board_no desc limit 1)
select * from notice_board where n_board_no = (select n_board_no from notice_board where n_board_no > #{n_board_no} order by n_board_no limit 1)

select nn.*,mm.mem_no,mm.Nickname from notice_board nn inner join member_Info mm on nn.mem_no=mm.mem_no
order by nn.n_board_no desc limit #{nn_startRow},10
